scripts.publish-dev-npm: npm run build-dev && npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish-stage-npm: npm run build-stage && npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish-prod-npm: env BUILD_ENV=prod npm run build-prod && npm run release-npm && npm run public-npm
scripts.release-npm: npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish --tag release
scripts.public-npm: npm version prepatch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-dev-cdn: npm run build-dev && aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-dev --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
scripts.publish-stage-cdn: npm run build-stage && aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-stage --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
scripts.publish-prod-cdn: npm run build-prod && aws s3 cp dist s3://payment-components-prod --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers --recursive --cache-control max-age=3
scripts.publish-dev: npm run publish-dev-npm && npm run publish-dev-cdn
scripts.publish-stage: npm run publish-stage-npm && npm run publish-stage-cdn
scripts.publish-prod: npm run publish-prod-npm && npm run publish-prod-cdn
